organizations: Holland Picks Radford Matthew Hatfield VirginiaPreps.com Martinsville
title: Holland Picks Radford
text: Matthew Hatfield VirginiaPreps.com Martinsville 6-foot-7 center Devonnte Holland was the Group 2A State Player of the Year last winter, leading the Bulldogs to their VHSL-record 14th State Championship. Holland hopes to repeat as a State Champ and Player of the Year next season. Beyond that, he now knows where he will play his College Basketball. See more here... ... More ...
